Section.title: Knowledge MCP Server
Section.desc: serving knowledge bases to preferred LLM clients.

Config.savedAndRestarted: MCP configuration saved and server restarted successfully
Config.saveRestartFailed: Failed to save configuration and restart MCP server
Config.copyFailed: Failed to copy configuration to clipboard
Config.title: MCP Server Configuration
Config.clientConfigDesc: Copy this configuration for use in MCP clients (Claude Desktop, VSCode, etc.)

JSON.title: MCP Configuration
JSON.failed: Failed to generate MCP configuration examples.
JSON.desc: Copy and use these configurations to connect MCP clients to the knowledge base server.
JSON.stdioDesc: Direct process communication via stdin/stdout. Recommended for desktop applications.
JSON.httpDesc: HTTP-based communication. Good for web-based clients and debugging.
JSON.sseDesc: SSE-based communication. Suitable for real-time web applications.
